title.rendered: “IDF Spokesperson on Iran’s Global Terror Network: A Threat to Israel and the World”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

IDF Spokesperson, Brigadier General Daniel Hacohen: “Iran is the world’s greatest sponsor of terror. The IDF is prepared for all scenarios and will take the necessary steps – together with our allies – to protect the citizens of the State of Israel.”

Attached is a link of IDF Spokesperson, Brigadier General Daniel Hacohen to the foreign media on the topic of Iranian involvement in the war and its impact on the Middle East: https://bit.ly/3TZlpu8

Attached is the full translation:

Iran funds, equips and arms terror branches across the Middle East and beyond.

Iran supports the terror organization Hamas that started this war on October 7. Iran supports Hezbollah that widened the war on October 8, and since then Iran – that supports militias in Iraq and Syria, and the Houthis in Yemen – has expanded the war into a global conflict.

Iran is the world’s greatest financier of terror. Iran’s terror network not only threatens the citizens of Israel, Gaza, Lebanon, and Syria; the regime in Iran is fueling the war in Ukraine and beyond.

Iran will face consequences if it chooses to escalate the situation further.

The State of Israel is on high alert. We have increased our readiness to defend the State of Israel from further Iranian aggression. We are also prepared to respond.

The Israel Defense Forces is prepared for all scenarios and will take the necessary steps – together with our allies – to protect our people.
